content.text: There's been a higher number of technical writers and technical content written. Every day I read content from new and emerging technical writers. One of the things I seem to notice is poor structure and images in articles.

With this, I've created a technical writing template and guide for new and emerging writers. This outlines how to structure your article, guides for using images and screenshots in articles, and code formatting.
